document.full_text: lloyd c. blankfein told jurors that rajat k. gupta, a former goldman sachs director involved in the case against raj rajaratnam, was in a position to know privileged information.
document.title: goldman sachs chief gets starring role at galleon trial
lines_and_colors: lloyd c. blankfein told jurors that rajat k. gupta, a former goldman sachs director involved in the case against raj rajaratnam, was in a position to know privileged information.
